channel.title: How do i chane the name from berk-scape to what i want?

item.title: How do i chane the name from berk-scape to what i want?
item.dc:creator: @Sparhawk Sparhawk
item.description:
@Sparhawk wrote:

[quote=“twins, post:2, topic:273839”]if its client go to class14 and control f it and change

if its in the source

control f in client.java[/quote]

as a little add to this, you may find the name in the “server.java” file too, ready to be switched up ^_^[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2009, 02:22:17 pm[/size][hr]But if you edit in notepad, do this:

in what ever file you are editing:

EDIT > REPLACE or
Ctrl + H
